title: Test last viewed question guidance
description: A questionnaire to test last viewed question guidance on different block types

contents.description: The following section concerns household members

options.description: For example, this is a second address or holiday home
options.label: No

question.title: Does anyone else live at your address?
What is the name of the person?
Are you sure you want to remove this person?

contents.description: The following section deals with the relationships in your household.

blocks.title: This will iterate over the people list, capturing the one way relationships.

title.text: Thinking of {first_person_name}, {second_person_name} is their husband or wife
Thinking of {first_person_name}, {second_person_name} is their son or daughter

options.label: Brother or sister

title.text: Thinking of {first_person_name}, {second_person_name} is their brother or sister

options.description: Including half brother or half sister

content.title: Thank you for your answers, do you wish to submit
